experience.title: HR Consultant
experience.description:
End to End HR consulting for VIJAY KHETAN GROUP, Suraj Estate & Vihang Group

Recruitment for all levels

Sourcing using online, internal/ direct, referrals

HR Business Partnering 

Reference checks/performance feedback collection

Reviewing & Presenting End to End Weekly & Monthly HR Reports of clients/management; catering to Payroll, Late coming, Recruitment, Exits, Employee Life Cycle, Performance Management, Grievance Management, Learning & Development.

Developing Org structures, Employee reporting system, HR Manual, Policy Handbooks and SOP's as per the transformation plan developed for clients.

Collecting Job Information and creating Job Descriptions, KPA's/KPI's

Conducting new employee performance management review 

Conducting required Soft Skill training at clients place

Conducting monthly audits for HR activities

Approving monthly attendance and late coming and leave calculations made by internal HR team for salary processing

Providing consultancy on employee performance challenges and grievances

Managing employee grievances

Conducting Exit Interviews and sharing reports with the management

experience.title: Assistant Professor - HR, Head - Student Personality Development Cell
experience.description:
Subjects Taught:

1) Training & Development

2) Emerging Trends in HRM

3) Communication Skills

4) Principles and Practices of Management

5) Organisational Behaviour


Additional Responsibility:

Coordinating for Personality Development Capsule (PDC) at DYPIMS.

Responsibilities handled are as follows;

1) Creating the PDC calendar every week for one hour session every day by coordinating with the faculty members.

2) Conducted sessions on Non-Verbal Communication, Office Manners, Group Discussions, Goal Setting, Effective Interview Techniques, Impression Management and Creative Thinking for the students.

3) Organising Industry Experts for Guest Lectures during PDC sessions.

4) Worked on NBA Accreditation Process for the Institute.

experience.title: HR Executive
experience.description:
HRMS - Complete ownership and use of HRMS 


Joining -Pre Joining Formalities like generating the employee identity numbers of the new joinees in the HRMS, collection of joining documents from the employees, generating offer letter of the candidate & issuance.


MIS Reports - Preparing New Joinee Report, Exit Report and Expected Joinee Report


Employee Help Desk - Handling / Resolution of  Employee queries through one to one conversation and e-mail 


Maintenance / Updation of employee data  - Responsible for updating employee records  in HRMS 


Probation Appraisal & Confirmation - Issuance of confirmation & probation /extension letter to employees & getting the same information updated in the HRMS


Exit Process - Following exit process of resigned employees, conducting exit interviews, Issuance of Acceptance of Resignation letters & relieving letters, follow up for the FNF process and updating the Exit entries in the HRMS.
experience.description_html:
HRMS - Complete ownership and use of HRMS

Joining -Pre Joining Formalities like generating the employee identity numbers of the new joinees in the HRMS, collection of joining documents from the employees, generating offer letter of the candidate & issuance.

MIS Reports - Preparing New Joinee Report, Exit Report and Expected Joinee Report

Employee Help Desk - Handling / Resolution of Employee queries through one to one conversation and e-mail

Maintenance / Updation of employee data - Responsible for updating employee records in HRMS

Probation Appraisal & Confirmation - Issuance of confirmation & probation /extension letter to employees & getting the same information updated in the HRMS

Exit Process - Following exit process of resigned employees, conducting exit interviews, Issuance of Acceptance of Resignation letters & relieving letters, follow up for the FNF process and updating the Exit entries in the HRMS.

recommendations: Kailas Shirke “I had the pleasure of working with Taruna during my job search, and I cannot recommend them highly enough. Her expertise, guidance, and dedication played a key role in helping me secure my new role at Mahindra. I am grateful for her support and would highly recommend Taruna to anyone looking for career opportunities. Thank you for making this journey a successful one!”

Monika S. “Taruna is a high energy performer , who thrives on deadlines and challenges . She is multi skilled individual with exceptional enthusiasm and great people management skills . Her work style is quite organized and "fun to be with". She has been great asset to our team and brings in a lot of positivity and energy. She is just unstoppable! Cheers :)”

publications.title: Relationship between HR Practices & Culture for Innovaiton.
publications.subtitle: DMIETR International Journal on Human Resource Management (ISSN – 2277 8667) Depaartment of Business Management at Datta Meghe Institute, Wardha

publications.title: Case Study on EMPLOYER’S GREVANCES
publications.subtitle: The Case Centre
publications.description: The case is all about the inception, development and growth of a small organization. It discovers the way things are managed and the problems faced by the people in running such organization. Since, the director of the organization did not take any professional education of management and the statutory provisions were also learnt as and when required he found 'disconnect' between the written provisions and their implementations. Being a strong spokesperson he has presented many issues to the notice of Government through different forums. Although, he himself was not providing proper wages and HR facilities to the workers as he was not fully aware of them

publications.title: Case Study on Need of HR Practices
publications.subtitle: The Case Centre
publications.description: In the Indian labour Law there are strict provisions for health & safety of workers and there are serious repercussions if any mishap occurs, although, Mr Sharma was concerned about the safety of workers but still he considered his way of handling it, to be sufficient enough to ensure the safety of workers. In this case the owner of a Medium organization wanted to find out the need of proper HR System. He also carried an attitude that no one can manage better HR than him. The real intension behind calling the academic researcher was to justify the decision that no HR executive is required in the organization.

publications.title: The Learning Organisation Concept To Build A Culture For Innovation

lead_score.reasoning: Taruna Sharma's role as a Manager in Learning & Development aligns well with mid-level management, scoring high in role fit. However, the industry (real estate development) scores low in alignment with our target industries. Company size and geographic details are not provided, leading to the lowest scores in those categories. Psychographic elements are somewhat aligned, given her role's focus on development and training. Motivation for recognition and career growth is moderately aligned. A micro-niche bonus is awarded for her focus on training and development in the corporate sector. No red flags are evident from the information provided.

company_search_results.summary: Arkade Developers is a prominent real estate developer based in Mumbai, India. The company is known for building quality residential and commercial properties across the city, emphasizing trust, quality, assurance, ethics, and transparency. With over four decades of experience, Arkade has completed numerous projects and continues to develop significant square footage in new projects. Their target customers include residents and businesses seeking premium real estate solutions in Mumbai.

company_linkedin_details.name: Arkade Developers Ltd
locations: Arkade House, Next to Children's Academy A.S. Marg, Ashok Nagar, Kandivali (E) Mumbai, Maharashtra 400101, IN
company_linkedin_details.about: About Arkade Developers Limited: (NSE: ARKADE | BSE: BOM: 544261) Arkade Developers, a premier real estate developer and listed entity on BSE and NSE with a rich legacy of over 38+ years, is celebrated for creating opulent residential properties. For Arkade Developers, constructing quality homes is driven by passion rather than just a profession. This philosophy has been guided by CMD, Mr. Amit Jain, leading Arkade Developers to become one of Mumbai's most esteemed real estate firms. Under their leadership, Arkade Developers has significantly impacted the city, consistently showcasing excellence. Committed to the ‘Family First’ principle, Arkade Developers upholds the core values of Trust, Transparency, Commitment, and Happiness. Every property bearing the Arkade name represents the pinnacle of quality, consistently surpassing customer expectations. 38+ years of legacy | 31 projects completed | 5.5+ M sq. ft. developed | 2+ M sq. ft. under development | 5500+ Happy Families | Listed Entity on BSE & NSE | Pioneers in Timely Delivery To know more, call on 9222892229 | info@arkade.in

updates.text: Celebrating one year of being listed on NSE & BSE. This milestone goes beyond numbers—it reflects our journey of resilience, trust, and a steadfast commitment to shaping lifestyles while redefining Mumbai’s skyline. As we look ahead, we remain dedicated to creating growth, excellence, and lasting value for all our stakeholders. To know more, read: https://lnkd.in/dTrCEPr8 #ArkadeDevelopers #1YearListed #GrowthJourney #MumbaiRealEstate #IPO #ListedEntity

updates.text: In a dynamic real estate landscape, managing price volatility and supply chain risks is paramount. At a recent industry roundtable, our Head of Projects, Sandesh Gaikwad shared key insights on how Arkade Developers overcome challenges and maintain project momentum without compromising on timelines and unwavering commitment to quality. Construction Week India #ArkadeDevelopers #RealEstate #IndustryRoundtable #ProjectExcellence #ConstructionChallenges #BuildingWithCare

company_linkedin_details.unformatted_about:
About Arkade Developers Limited: (NSE: ARKADE | BSE: BOM: 544261)

Arkade Developers, a premier real estate developer and listed entity on BSE and NSE with a rich legacy of over 38+ years, is celebrated for creating opulent residential properties. 

For Arkade Developers, constructing quality homes is driven by passion rather than just a profession. This philosophy has been guided by CMD, Mr. Amit Jain, leading Arkade Developers to become one of Mumbai's most esteemed real estate firms. Under their leadership, Arkade Developers has significantly impacted the city, consistently showcasing excellence. 

Committed to the ‘Family First’ principle, Arkade Developers upholds the core values of Trust, Transparency, Commitment, and Happiness. Every property bearing the Arkade name represents the pinnacle of quality, consistently surpassing customer expectations.

38+ years of legacy | 31 projects completed | 5.5+ M sq. ft. developed | 2+ M sq. ft. under development | 5500+ Happy Families | Listed Entity on BSE & NSE | Pioneers in Timely Delivery

To know more, call on 9222892229 | info@arkade.in
